extracted_playbook.title: Check for Software Updates for CVE-2024-8525
extracted_playbook.description: Access the authorized dealer support site to download and apply the software update for CVE-2024-8525.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Latest Supported Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the software to the latest supported version as the last support date for v7.0 was 1/27/2023.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Version 8.0 for CVE-2024-8526
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure the system is updated to version 8.0 to fix the vulnerability CVE-2024-8526.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow Security Best Practices for BAS
extracted_playbook.description: Follow Automated Logic's Security Best Practices Checklists for Building Automation Systems to ensure alignment with best practices installation guidelines.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed in CISA's resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to CISA's resources for more information on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
